articles.title: Robert Redford remembered for his deep legacy in environmental activism and Native American advocacy - AP News
articles.description: Robert Redford, who died Tuesday at 89, was known for his deep commitment to activism, especially for Native American rights and the environment. In the 1970s, while starring in films like “The Sting,” he became involved in the environmental movement. He succ…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Lorie Lee Sekayumptewa, a former administrator with the Navajo Nation Film Office, remembers seeing Robert Redford at traditional cultural dances at the Hopi village of Hotevilla in New… [+5136 chars]

articles.title: 120 land and environmental defenders killed or disappeared in Latin America last year, report finds - AP News
articles.description: A report by Global Witness reveals that at least 146 land and environmental defenders have been killed or gone missing worldwide in 2024. Over 80% of these cases occurred in Latin America. The report, released Wednesday, highlights Colombia as the deadliest c…
